General.Name: Wuhu Token Sciences
General.Description: Wuhu Token Sciences Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, processing, manufacture, sale, and service of key touch display device materials in China. It offers ITO transparent conductive glasses, touch sensors and modules, high-end mobile phone LCM liquid crystal modules, etc., as well as TFT-LCD panel thinning products. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Wuhu, China.
General.Address: East of Qijing Second Road, Wuhu, China, 241009

8.Name: Mr. Weida  Chen
